ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Umm... easy on the mana...
ygData.msgSnippet: WTG on the big 5 0 ! ! !  Woo hoo!  Nice work John(tm)!!! I am glad my short lived burst of speed gave you the inspiration - or at least added to it to beat
ygData.messageBody:
WTG on the big 5 0 ! ! ! Woo hoo! Nice work John(tm)!!!

I am glad my short lived burst of speed gave you the inspiration - or at
least added to it to 'beat me to 50" - Grats!! I keep thinking <boo hoo>
spectres are green now - nobody will take me to the SS room - I will never
make 50. Hmm maybe i should go to Guk and see what John(tm) was able to
solo. but then I remember that almost every post where you mention solo in
the maze on the live side is followed with tips on fear / invis running to
the zone <grin> Pass. But I do believe that I can solo blue DW gobs. Me
and a necro were taking them with ease. Otherwise it looks like Seafurys
and Everlost Ice (frost? they drop frost giant toes) giants for the
remaining bubs. Bouncers are green, kobs are green, specs are green <gah>
We even mounted an expedition to the perma bear caves in search of blue
mobs. Heh, we found em. Try 6 blue bears agro early because someones invis
drops. Thank god we had 2 enchanters cuz one died. Oh yeah, you need a
live gater to get out. Yes, you can climb the ladder and kill the 2 IG's
and the Dragon if she is up and run out thru the lair but gating is easier.
All in all it was very fun to do some thing that was a risk, and new, and
different.

I thought you or someone would catch that <g> I dont use it in 'normal'
fights in Hate or other multiple mob pulls. But I knew Inny would be all
alone and I wanted to see if I could get it to stick on him. It didn't.
Also, I was guessing I would be playing the hymn and niv's late in the fight
and thought maybe string enhancements and all... well I should have used
Chords of Dischord <g>. It would be bad to have Inny die to the DoT bug and
see his corpse poof.

Sylly.

p.s. overheard in the bear caves...

Raloon tells the group, "No offense but I really hate bards."
Dunk tells the group, "why?"
Raloon tells the group, "damn bard song drops invis just as i run off to
have a look"
Sylly tells the group, "No offense but i really hate enchanters who dont say
STOP SONG before the cast invis on thenselves and go running around <g>"

Bah, I really hate having a puller or 'go looker' in the group <s>

> From: <kim@...>
>
> On Mon, 27 Mar 2000, Sylly Songsynger wrote:
> >
> > Bardette of 48 songs (Saturday - ice giants for 2 bubs; Sun more ice
giants
>
> Doh. I hit 50 this weekend.
>
> > [Sat Mar 25 00:16:22 2000] Your target resisted the Selo`s Chords of
> > Cessation spell.
>
> Damn, you have enough guts to use AE in Hate? :)
